resources.string: A traveler named Aaron, decided to go to the island El Dorado, and from afar he saw what he was looking for 6 years. This is the mythical island of El Dorado, no one believed in its existence, but he found it. Aaron saw mountains of gold, gold sculptures, but here\'s a problem, on the slot machine there is a note: play 5 times, and you can go further down the hall, and get all the wealth.
All Eldorado\'s wealth is now yours, just take it and leave as soon as possible.
